dict.acceptation: 扮演；担任，充当…的角色；演出；装扮；
玩耍，游戏；[游戏] 参加游戏；赌博；闹着玩；

sent.orig: Day. Play. We play all day.
Mainframe and vice-typing in order Play. bat start the game.
sent.trans: 主机和副机在命令键入Play.bat启动游戏。

sent.orig: Playing MP3 state, long press PLAY button, indicator light Quanmie to complete the shutdown.
sent.trans: 在播放MP3状态，长按PLAY按钮，指示灯全灭，完成关机。

sent.orig: Long press PLAY button, yellow constant light, that is, boot into standby.
sent.trans: 长按PLAY按钮，黄灯常亮，即开机，进入待机状态。

sent.orig: Stunt play, three class rapid play, shifting slow play, play by frame.
sent.trans: 特技播放，三级快放，变速慢放、帧播放。
